page.title: 01Witherley and environs
page.content:
This rural area contains the villages of Witherley and Ratcliffe Culey, the hamlet of Atterton and part of the village of Fenny Drayton.
Most of the area is farmland, the farms being medium-sized and a mixture of arable and livestock. Several of the farms in Witherley are owned by Lord O'Neill, who lives in Ireland but pays regular visits to his tenants.
Witherley is the home of the Atherstone Hunt Kennels, where the hounds are kept for fox-hunting in the area.
Modern housing in the area is largely occupied by people who work in nearby towns and cities.
